input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Mosaic Cross Pendant Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Heritage Silver Charm Chain'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain Choker Set in 14K Gold Plated'
  - Name='CRAFTD London 3mm Gold Tennis Chain Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON Silver Rope Chain Stack, 22"/24"'
  - Name='CRAFTD 5MM Rope Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Snake Chain 2mm'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Black Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This competitor is a Cuban link product with an 'iced out' style similar in construction and purpose to the reference Cuban link chain, though it is a set and possibly includes items beyond just chains.
Although a chain, it is focused on a pendant style (mosaic cross) which differs from the plain Cuban link chain and may have different silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Cuban link chain construction but as a bracelet rather than a necklace, making it moderately relevant but smaller and different usage.
Very similar product type (Cuban link chain) with slightly different gauge (10mm vs 8mm), in gold vs silver, but overall very relevant.
A silver chain but described as a charm chain, suggesting a different construction and style from a Cuban link chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Miami Cuban Link Chain Choker Set in 14K Gold Plated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Cuban link chain choker set, quite similar in construction to the reference but shorter (choker length) and gold plated instead of stainless steel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London 3mm Gold Tennis Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a tennis chain type, which has a very different link style and much smaller gauge, less relevance.
Almost identical type of product (Cuban link silver chain) with minor gauge difference (10mm vs 8mm), making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link construction in a bracelet form with iced out styling, similar but different format and gold color.
Silver chain but rope style, which differs significantly from Cuban link design and silhouette.
A rope chain style with smaller gauge, significantly different from Cuban link chains.
A snake chain is very different in design, construction, and gauge from a Cuban link chain, making it minimally relevant.
